EmailTemplate.name: International YETI Pro request denial
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thanks for submitting your application for the YETI Pro Program. We are pumped that you want to partner with us.
The program is not currently set up to support our International friends just yet but we are working on this! Please check base with us in 2019 for an update.
As always, reach out if you have any questions. We love hearing from our YETI partners.
Happy Adventures
!User.CommunityNickname}
The YETI Outfitters
512.394.9384
customerservice@yeti.com
yeti.com
